file_content.text: I'll see you around.
Hey there!
Captain! Corporal Jorda Pell, with the Safecrackers. It's a real honor to meet you, a real honor!
She's been here ten minutes and we've already heard about your little stunt on Quesh at least ten times. I don't think you'll be paying for many drinks tonight.
I just did my job, that's all.
It was nothing.
Awfully modest for the head of Havoc Squad.
If that's how it is, I won't complain.
I like free drinks.
Fantastic!
I came here to get away from all of the missions, not to talk about them more.
Don't talk about work.
I don't know if denying your fans is really an option at this point.
I--I'm sorry. We can talk about something else. I just--you saved our lives!
Told you so.
Our other friend here is Keran. She runs with those navy punks, but I've forgiven her for it.
Keran Vondi, gunnery officer on the Brentaal Star. I don't think you've saved my life yet, but it's still nice to meet you.
I don't run into many navy officers. Pleasure to meet you.
Likewise.
Saving lives just comes with the territory.
I help everyone eventually.
That's what Jaxo said. You must have a lot of crazy stories.
All right, let's focus, people.
What are we up to, Jaxo?
So what's the plan?
We're going to carry out a very special operation.
Keran just got a big promotion, you two obviously have a lot to celebrate, and I have a day off for once.
Recon shows eight cantinas within taxi range. We're going to hit them all, and we're going to hit them hard.
Let's move out!
Sounds good!
I'm think I'm actually inspired, Jaxo.
Nice speech.
Of course you are. We've got a duty here--we're representing the Republic armed forces, after all.
If it's a cantina crawl, I'll leave you to it.
I think I'll pass.
Oh, no! You have to come! Please?
Come on, we never get a chance to kick back like this! Don't bail on us now!
You got me. Let's do this.
All right, I'll go.
That's more like it!
First round's on me!
Okay, you've got me for one round, but that's it.
I guess one drink won't hurt.
Fine, as long as I'm buying!
Heh, you are insane, Jaxo, you know that?
You're the one who brought them over, not me. If your navy pals can't drink a sweet little girl like me under the table, that's their problem.
Hey. Hey--you know what? You are amazing. You're an amazing woman, okay? Just, totally amazing.
That's very nice of you to say, Jorda.
Thank you.
You're, uh... you're a very nice girl, too.
Uh... okay?
Thank you so much!
You're bombed out of your mind, huh?
You are very, very drunk.
I... what? No, I do forward assault. The bomb guys are Norro, and Vinny, and Squint, and... uh....
Tell you what, Jorda. My bed's over there--why don't you go lay down for a bit, huh?
I'd better call it a night myself. See you, Jaxo.
It was great meeting you.
I guess you'd probably better get going too, huh? I hope you had a good time. We don't nearly get enough of them in this line of work.
If not for people like us, nobody would be having any good times.
We do what we have to.
Heh. Duty, honor, sacrifice... it all sounds great until you actually have to do it.
Ah, listen to me droning on, philosophizing like some senile old Jedi....
The army definitely isn't big on time off.
You can say that again.
When this war's over, I'm getting a normal job with normal hours on the most boring planet I can find.
Heh. Who am I kidding? I couldn't hold a normal job if my life depended on it.
You'd better get out while you can--after that many rounds, I could be talking nonsense for hours. I'll see you around, big shot.
I don't know about you, but I didn't sign up to have fun.
Don't get whiney on me.
I signed up to fight. Period.
Heh. I guess that's why you're a captain in charge of Havoc Squad, and I'm still a sergeant pulling eight-week tours of the galaxy's finest slime holes.
Ah, whatever. You take care out there, all right? I'll see you around.
You'll just have to have fun without me. See you around.
I'm not going.
What the... fine. Whatever. Let's go.
Hey there. Glad you could make it.
Sit down, take a load off. I hear you've been a busy man lately.
Havoc's got a lot on our plate these days.
It's true.
What have you been up to lately?
How have you been?
Same old, same old. Spent forever chasing down a hitman from Imperial Intelligence, but we finally nailed him.
Quite a stunt you pulled on Quesh. I've got a pal in the Safecrackers who says you took on half the Empire singlehanded.
My pal in the Safecrackers says you pulled them out of a real tight spot on Quesh.
She wanted to know everything about you, of course. I did my best to make you sound boring and ugly. Enough competition out there as it is.
I've got to be honest with you, Jaxo. I'm in a relationship.
I'm with someone else now.
Huh. Figures, I guess.
I don't think there's really any competition for you, Jaxo.
Fine by me.
True. I am pretty amazing.
Worried some other girl might catch my eye?
Feeling protective, huh?
I don't care who catches your eye, as long as that babe you met back on Coruscant is the one you don't forget.
Reputation isn't my number one priority.
Like I care.
That's what I like about you.
So get over here already.
I do enjoy these little get-togethers.
Gladly.
Of course you do.
I think I'm the one who should be giving the orders.
Pulling rank on me, huh? Whatever you say--sir.
I'll pass this time, Jaxo.
You came all the way here just to say that?
Hey, whatever, suit yourself. If you aren't interested, you know where the door is.
She wanted to know every last thing about you. I made sure to mention how you resisted my charms, so she's well warned.
I'm in a relationship with someone else, actually.
I'm already taken.
Ah, so the truth comes out! Busy in more ways than one, huh? Come on, spill.
She'd better be at least the second most charming and attractive girl in the galaxy, or I'm not going to be happy.
She's amazing, Jaxo. Completely amazing.
I really care for her.
All right, all right. Say no more.
She's Elara Dorne, our squad medic.
Her name is Elara.
Dorne? You've got to be kidding me! Ahem... uh, sorry. She's definitely got looks, no doubt about it. And a lot of... personality.
You don't actually want to hear about her, do you?
Do you really want to know?
Yeah, no. I think I'll pass.
Look, I'm happy for you. Really. I'm glad you've found someone.
Look... you should probably just get going, huh? Lots to do, places to be and all that. But it was good catching up with you. Captain.
Is this some kind of blind date situation?
Are you trying to set me up?
You wish I was that nice. I figure if she's interested, she'll find you on her own time.
Are you going to tell me who she is, or what?
Does she have a name?
Forget about it--my lips are sealed. If she wants to find you on her own time, that's her business. I'm not getting involved.
I may have said "no" once, but that doesn't mean "no" forever.
Does in my book. You turn down Ava Jaxo once, you're off the list. But nice try.
You didn't really invite me over to shoot the breeze, did you?
Hmph. You don't want to talk now, you won't have time to talk later... what am I going to do with you?
Had enough fun for one day, huh? I guess it is getting late.
I'm glad you came by. Don't be a stranger.
Let me know when you're free again.
I won't.
You got it.
I've got a lot on my plate right now, Jaxo.
We'll see.
Yeah, yeah. Commander of Havoc Squad, really important, I know.
I could probably stick around a little longer.
[Flirt] I don't have to go.
No, no. You think I want Garza to put a bounty on my head? I'm not holding you up any more than I already have.
See you around.
Oh, you're interested now? No sale, big shot.
Come on, my place is boring. Let's go grab a drink or something.
Oh, man. That'll be the last time any of those navy guys pick the girl to arm-wrestle for the tab, I guarantee it!
All right, enough excitement for one day. Thanks for coming by--I had a really great time.
Let's do it again sometime.
Me too.
Have a good night. And take it easy, all right?
I'll leave you to it.
You got it.
You know, the good times don't have to end now.
[Flirt] I could stay.
Give it up, would you? That speeder has sailed!
I'll see you later. Okay. So long.
You need something?
Gladly.
Who's the officer here?
Gladly.
Who's the officer here?
[Flirt] I wouldn't say that.
[Flirt] I wouldn't say that.
No thanks.
No thanks.
[Flirt] I'm not here to chat.
[Flirt] I'm not here to chat.
